rukus.text: inna rabbakumu l-lahu alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ʿala l-ʿarshi yugh'shi al-layla l-nahara yatlubuhu hathithan wal-shamsa wal-qamara wal-nujuma musakharatin bi-amrihi ala lahu l-khalqu wal-amru tabaraka l-lahu rabbu l-ʿalamina
id'ʿu rabbakum tadarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu la yuhibbu l-muʿ'tadina
wala tuf'sidu fi l-ardi baʿda is'lahiha wa-id'ʿuhu khawfan watamaʿan inna rahmata l-lahi qaribun mina l-muh'sinina

wahuwa alladhi yur'silu l-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi hatta idha aqallat sahaban thiqalan suq'nahu libaladin mayyitin fa-anzalna bihi l-maa fa-akhrajna bihi min kulli l-thamarati kadhalika nukh'riju l-mawta laʿallakum tadhakkaruna
wal-baladu l-tayibu yakhruju nabatuhu bi-idh'ni rabbihi wa-alladhi khabutha la yakhruju illa nakidan kadhalika nusarrifu l-ayati liqawmin yashkuruna
